channel.title: CVE Feed for Andrei Lupu -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Andrei Lupu -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-6029|2024-08-04T20:16:23.236Z -- andrei%20lupu -- custom%20body%20class
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Custom Body Class 0.6.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2019-6030|2024-08-04T20:16:24.283Z -- andrei%20lupu -- custom%20body%20class
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Custom Body Class 0.6.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.
